tree

Interface TreeIF

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Leaf, Tree

    public interface TreeIF
    Interface of a tree to be grown in the forest

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getDepth()
      Computes the depth of the tree.
      int[] getOob()
      The tree might be grown from a subset of the whole dataset.
      void grow()
      Grow the tree from a set of learning samples from at least two classes.
      int predict(double[] x)
      Predicts the label of a p-dimensional sample.

    • Method Detail

      • grow

        void grow()
        Grow the tree from a set of learning samples from at least two classes.

      • predict

        int predict(double[] x)
        Predicts the label of a p-dimensional sample.
        Parameters:
        x - the feature vector of a sample to be predicted.
        Returns:
        the label of the prediction

      • getDepth

        int getDepth()
        Computes the depth of the tree. The root node is at depth 0. A decision stump has a depth of 1.
        Returns:
        tree depth

      • getOob

        int[] getOob()
        The tree might be grown from a subset of the whole dataset. The data points not used during the tree induction form the out-of-bag (OOB). This methods returns the indices of OOB samples in an array.
        Returns:
        the indices of the OOB samples.
